title: PARIS Watch Face - Moto 360
summary: Highly customizable watch face for Moto 360 inspired by the beautiful Paris.
developerAddress: 1700 Sofia, Prof. Georgi Bradistilov 6, fl. 4, Belvek Ltd.
description: Paris is always a good idea.It's Time!Design your virtual trip as you like it. Just in seconds.Choose among:★ 30 amazing sights in Paris:The Eiffel Tower, Notre Dame, Louvre Museum, Versailles Palace, Galeries Lafayette, Cafés & Macarons, Cruise on the Seine......★ 4 color options for the Dial, Numbers and Hands: -   Black -   White-   Golden -   Silver★ Explore thousands of various combinations and be different whenever you want.★ Enjoy the tiny animation of the seconds indicator.★ Install PARIS watch face and see the iconic Paris sights and attractions now!Just a click from you.It's time...Time for ParisWe appreciate your feedback!In case of any problems, please, contact us on: belvekltd@gmail.com
descriptionHTML:
Paris is always a good idea.
It's Time!

Design your virtual trip as you like it. Just in seconds.
Choose among:

★ 30 amazing sights in Paris:
The Eiffel Tower, Notre Dame, Louvre Museum, Versailles Palace, Galeries Lafayette, Cafés & Macarons, Cruise on the Seine......

★ 4 color options for the Dial, Numbers and Hands:
- Black
- White
- Golden
- Silver

★ Explore thousands of various combinations and be different whenever you want.
★ Enjoy the tiny animation of the seconds indicator.
★ Install PARIS watch face and see the iconic Paris sights and attractions now!

Just a click from you.
It's time...
Time for Paris



We appreciate your feedback!
In case of any problems, please, contact us on: belvekltd@gmail.com
comments: Great concept Only thing that could be changed are the hands. They are not detailed and glossy enough. That seems to be the case for most watch faces independent of the developer. Overall great concept and more cities would likely lead to more revenue. Thanks for putting this one up for free.
Like it Love the classic feel.. Parisian theme only makes it better.. Roman numerals perfect for that vintage look.. The hands cud've been glossier.. But overall I'd definitely recommend
Broken on the Huawei watch. Doesn't line up with the face.
Face does not center on moto 360
It was totally off centre? Couldn't look at it
